CHAT.comment: Transcriber 1 Pamela Dudley 24-OCT-89 Transcriber 2 Dona Bernard 19-APR-90
C hits M X3; M hits C X1

u.a: C is trying to drink out of the wrong side of cup
C has a mouth full of food
M pointing to one cookie C has bitten into
M kneels beside C; C cries
<bef> C tries to put food in his hand back in container
M takes C in arms; M holds cookie away from table
C smacks M as she gets up to get something
M wipes C's nose and C cries
M smacks C's hand; M picks up cookies from floor
<bef> C cries; cries louder; stomps feet
<bef> C looks into camera; C hits M .
M puts cracker and container in box; C gets container and cracker out of box .
<bef> C stomps feet; C hits M
C holds arms up; M picks up C
